vistra.framework.graph

Class GraphManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • vistra.framework.graph.GraphManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGraphManager

     class GraphManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGraphManager
    A graph manager. Holds a graph instance and manages e.g. opening and saving (read/write) graphs.
    Author:
    Roland Bruggmann (brugr9@bfh.ch)
    See Also:
    LayoutGraph, GraphReader, GraphWriter
